attributes.action: Strip Jimmy Savile of his knighthood!
attributes.additional_details:
Surely the shocking allegations and overwhelming amount of evidence against 'Sir' Jimmy Savile should be enough to get his knighthood stripped?

Whether the allegations are proven, someone so highly respected by minors of the time and, I dare say, a potential role model for young people today - should not be actively glorified and thus supported by Government if there are such allegations against him?
